xmlText.p: First Period_1, Arizona, Rinaldo 3 (Domi, Fischer), 1:53. 2, Arizona, Dvorak 6 (Keller, Demers), 4:02. 3, Arizona, Dvorak 7 (Rieder, Keller), 7:06. 4, Arizona, Perlini 12 (L.Schenn, Panik), 13:15. Penalties_None.

Second Period_5, Arizona, Fischer 13 (Chychrun, Domi), 4:33 (pp). 6, St. Louis, B.Schenn 19, 9:27 (pp). Penalties_Berglund, STL, (slashing), 2:37; Demers, ARI, (hooking), 7:49; Edmundson, STL, (tripping), 14:00; Fischer, ARI, (tripping), 18:07.

Third Period_7, St. Louis, Steen 9 (Dunn, Berglund), 9:44 (pp). Penalties_Dvorak, ARI, (delay of game), 8:32; Brodziak, STL, served by Jaskin, (unsportsmanlike conduct), 10:54; Brodziak, STL, Major (fighting), 10:54; Rinaldo, ARI, Major (fighting), 10:54.
Power-play opportunities_Arizona 1 of 3; St. Louis 2 of 3.
Goalies_Arizona, Raanta 7-12-5 (27 shots-25 saves). St. Louis, Hutton 10-4-1 (12-9), Allen 18-14-2 (32-30).
Referees_Jake Brenk, Wes McCauley. Linesmen_David Brisebois, Brad Kovachik.
